name: Flee the Reaper
description:
How to Play

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Collect as many gold diamonds as you can while evading your ghostly adversary!

Move against a wall in midair to wall-run. You have two extra mid-air jumps, but jumping while wall-running doesn't cost an extra jump.

Flee the Reaper started out as a short game jam-like project for a prototyping class. I've given it a touch of polish so it can stand on its own a little more.
